name: Hook & Shield
description:
Hook & Shield is a tactical combat rogue like inspired by Auro and Hoplite. The main method of killing enemies is either pushing or pulling them into spiked walls or lava pools. You have two items a shield with which you can bash and a hook with which you can pull enemies. Leap can stun adjacent enemies.

How to Play

Use the mouse to select one of the 4 actions. Then drag left, right, up or down to select where you want to bash/hook. When leaping just click one of the possible leaping positions.
